About Us Welcome to Ceiling Magic, your premier destination for innovative and stylish ceiling solutions in India. Our journey began with a simple mission: to transform spaces with high-quality, aesthetically pleasing ceiling designs that combine functionality with modern elegance. Over the years, we have grown to become a trusted name in the industry, known for our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. At Ceiling Magic, we believe that the ceiling is an essential element of interior design that can significantly enhance the overall look and feel of a space. That's why we offer a diverse range of products, including false ceilings, ceiling panels, and tiles, each crafted with precision and attention to detail. Our designs cater to various tastes and preferences, ensuring that every customer finds the perfect fit for their home or office. Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing top-notch service, from initial consultation to final installation. We take the time to understand your needs and preferences, offering personalized solutions that meet your specific requirements. Our goal is to not only meet but exceed your expectations, delivering results that you can be proud of. Join the many satisfied customers who have transformed their spaces with Ceiling Magic. Discover the difference that quality craftsmanship and exceptional service can make. Thank you for considering Ceiling Magic for your ceiling needs – we look forward to helping you create a space that truly stands out. POPULAR QUESTIONS What types of ceiling designs do you offer? We offer a wide range of ceiling designs including false ceilings, ceiling panels, and ceiling tiles. Our designs vary from modern and sleek to classic and elegant, ensuring there is something to match every taste and style. Are your ceiling materials durable? Yes, all our ceiling materials are sourced from top-quality suppliers and are designed to be durable and long-lasting. We ensure that our products meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Do you provide installation services? Yes, we provide professional installation services. Our team of skilled installers ensures that every ceiling is installed to perfection, paying close attention to detail and craftsmanship. Can I customize my ceiling design? Absolutely! We offer customized ceiling solutions to meet your specific needs and preferences. Our design team will work with you to create a ceiling that fits your space perfectly. What is the lead time for ceiling installation? The lead time for installation varies depending on the scope of the project and the specific design requirements. Generally, we aim to complete installations within 2-4 weeks from the time of order confirmation. Do you offer any warranty on your products? Yes, we offer a warranty on all our ceiling products to ensure your peace of mind. The warranty period and terms vary depending on the specific product. Please contact us for more details. What is the cost of your ceiling solutions? The cost of our ceiling solutions depends on the type of ceiling, materials used, and the complexity of the design. We offer competitive pricing and are happy to provide a detailed quote based on your requirements. How do I maintain my ceiling? Maintaining your ceiling is simple. Regular dusting and occasional cleaning with a damp cloth will keep it looking new. For specific maintenance instructions, please refer to the care guidelines provided with your purchase. Can I see samples of your work? Yes, we have a portfolio of completed projects that you can view. Please visit our website gallery or contact us to arrange a visit to one of our completed installations. Where are you located? Our showroom and office are located in [Your City], India. Please visit our Contact Us page for our full address and directions. How do I place an order? You can place an order by contacting us directly through our website, by phone, or by visiting our showroom. Our team will guide you through the process and help you select the perfect ceiling solution for your needs. Do you offer after-sales support? Yes, we offer comprehensive after-sales support to ensure your complete satisfaction. If you have any issues or questions after your installation, our support team is always ready to assist you. pages.privacy: Ceiling Magic - Modern and Stylish Ceiling Solutions in India | Privacy Policy Home About us FAQ Catalog Contact us Privacy Policy At Ceiling Magic, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and address when you contact us or place an order. We also collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and cookies to improve our website's functionality and user experience. How We Use Your Information The information we collect is used to process your orders, communicate with you, improve our services, and personalize your experience. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law. Security of Your Information We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Your Choices and Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also choose to opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. Please contact us if you wish to exercise these rights. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this page regularly for any updates. Your continued use of our website after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at ceilingmagic@gmail.com Contacts Jss Ceiling & Floorings, WZ C-105, Post Office St, Naraina Village, Naraina, New Delhi, Delhi 110028, India +919654449397 ceilingmagic@gmail.com Links Home About us FAQ Catalog Contact us Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
